review_1: My full video review: https://youtu.be/-t4ks-udf18 Space Simulator 3D is an exceptional app that allows you to create your own star system and share it with others. Add planets and stars, and witness the fascinating impact of gravity and celestial object destruction on the trajectories and orbits of these cosmic entities. Immerse yourself in the role of a world creator within this remarkable simulation app designed for Meta Quest. While the visuals may not reach the level of sharpness I had hoped for, and the texture animation could have enhanced realism, these minor drawbacks do not detract from the enchantment of the experience. I found myself assuming a godlike presence, marveling at the ability to observe and experiment within this celestial realm at my disposal. Occasional bugs may be encountered, and the controls could benefit from a more intuitive design. However, despite these minor imperfections, Space Simulator 3D delivers a truly distinctive and unforgettable experience.
